item.title: Lanturn Glow - April 15, 2025
item.description: Building on the flu spike, this glow focuses on resilience. Learn how to book your flu shot and wash hands effectively, paired with a stress-busting technique to stay steady. Small wins build strength—share your shot selfie to inspire others!

This week's digest tackles a global flu spike, an Ohio factory fire, and tech layoffs. We uncover shared stakes—health, safety, opportunity—and offer actionable steps like getting vaccinated, testing smoke alarms, and upskilling. Join us to build a stronger tomorrow, together.
